Topic.Title: Pest -- Play notes & tips, please mark spoilers

Posts.EditableText:
I wanted to point out an error which, while small, has an important impact on play.
In the Kitchen, when you try to take the ladle, it says, "I don't want to." However, if you check your inventory afterward, you are in fact holding the ladle. I had the ladle for a good bit of time before I realized it. I still haven't figured out what to do with it, but I wanted to make sure others weren't confused by this.
